mapper.select: select * from users u left join `type` t on u.user_type = t.user_type left join grade g on u.user_grade = g.user_grade where user_id =#{userId}
select user_id from users where name = #{name} and email=#{email} and user_type=#{userType.userType}
mapper.insert: insert into users(user_id, password, name, nick, gender, birthday, user_leave_condition, tel, address, detail_address, email, user_type, user_grade) values(#{userId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{nick}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{userLeaveCondition}, #{tel}, #{address}, #{detailAddress}, #{email}, #{userType.userType}, #{userGrade.userGrade})
